mapper.select:
select
from abc_invest_order where io_origin_id = #{ioOriginId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and io_out_seq_no !="" order by io_createtime desc

io_origin_id = #{ioOriginId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

limit 0, 1

where io_id = #{ioId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
